string.text:
An advanced version of the AK-74M developed by the American company Rifle Dynamics. It is one of the most high-tech weapons in the Zone. Used by ISG special units.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] ATPIAL (Advanced Target Pointer Illuminator Aiming Laser) AN/PEQ-15 produced by L3 Insight Technologies. Tactical device that combines laser designators in both visible and IR band with IR searchlight.
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Universal mount by NcStar with Trijicon RMR red dot sight installed on it.
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: All scopes for Picatinny/weaver.
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: TGP-A suppressor

A custom model developed on the basis of AKM by the American company Rifle Dynamics. It is one of the most high-tech weapons in the Zone. Used by ISG special units.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] ATPIAL (Advanced Target Pointer Illuminator Aiming Laser) AN/PEQ-15 produced by L3 Insight Technologies. Tactical device that combines laser designators in both visible and IR band with IR searchlight.
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: All scopes for Picatinny/weaver
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: ATG suppressor

A custom model developed on the basis of AKSU by the American company Rifle Dynamics. It is one of the most high-tech weapons in the Zone. Used by ISG special units.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: All scopes for Picatinny/weaver
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: TGP-A suppressor

Modification RD-74U ISG, developed by the American company Rifle Dynamics. It is one of the most high-tech weapons in the Zone. Used by ISG special units.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] ATPIAL (Advanced Target Pointer Illuminator Aiming Laser) AN/PEQ-15 produced by L3 Insight Technologies. Tactical device that combines laser designators in both visible and IR band with IR searchlight.
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: All scopes for Picatinny/weaver
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: TGP-A suppressor
